00042 class GHOST_EventTrackpad : public GHOST_Event
00043 {
00044 public:
00053     GHOST_EventTrackpad(GHOST_TUns64 msec,
00054                         GHOST_IWindow* window,
00055                         GHOST_TTrackpadEventSubTypes subtype,
00056                         GHOST_TInt32 x, GHOST_TInt32 y,
00057                         GHOST_TInt32 deltaX, GHOST_TInt32 deltaY)
00058         : GHOST_Event(msec, GHOST_kEventTrackpad, window)
00059     {
00060         m_trackpadEventData.subtype = subtype;
00061         m_trackpadEventData.x = x;
00062         m_trackpadEventData.y = y;
00063         m_trackpadEventData.deltaX = deltaX;
00064         m_trackpadEventData.deltaY = deltaY;
00065         m_data = &m_trackpadEventData;
00066     }
00067

00070     GHOST_TEventTrackpadData m_trackpadEventData;
00071 };
